document.docAuthor: Santos, Maria Aparecida Laurindo dos, Castro, Patrícia Madedo de & Magalhães, Célio
document.masterDocTitle: Freshwater shrimps (Crustacea, Decapoda, Caridea, Dendrobranchiata) from Roraima, Brazil: species composition, distribution, and new records

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Freshwater shrimps (Crustacea, Decapoda, Caridea, Dendrobranchiata) from Roraima, Brazil: species composition, distribution, and new records

subSubSection.paragraph:
Previous records . Castro and Silva (2013 : as
M. inpa
in
p. 41, and
M. brasiliense
in p. 42).

Identification characters ( Fig. 3D–G ). Rostrum straight, short, slightly directed downwards, reaching (or failing short of reaching) distal margin of scaphocerite; rostral formula: 8–13(1–3 post-orbital teeth)/2–5. Carapace with antennal and hepatic teeth present, anterolateral portion roughened by numerous spinules; abdomen also roughened by spinules, pleura of second somite enlarged and overlapping pleuron of first and third somites. Telson with posterior margin distinct, ending in a small acute point, usually overreached by inner pair of posterolateral spines. P2 (larger cheliped) similar in shape, unequal in size; larger cheliped overreaching scaphocerite with entire length of carpus, palm subcylindrical in crosssection, fingers a little less than half the length of palm, with row of tubercles on cutting edges.

Material examined. 1 male ( INPA 2347), Amajarí, igarapé Tepequém, tributary of rio Amajarí, [ 03°41ʹ28.13ʺ N , 061°42ʹ05.22ʺ W ], 24-II-2011 , colls. A.A. Otaviano, F.C. Zanetti and A. Sales; 11 males ( MIRR 274), Amajarí, unnamed igarapé, tributary of rio Amajarí, [ 03°38ʹ41.80ʺ N , 061°41ʹ38.16ʺ W , 24-IX-2010 , colls. D. Teixeira and O. Grigio Jr.; 1 male , 8 females (1 ovig.) ( MIRR 195), Amajarí, vila Bom Jesus, igarapé Coimbra, tributary of rio Trairão, 3°37ʹ03.0ʺ N , 061°49ʹ46.5ʺ W , 31-X-2009 , colls. P.M. Castro and A.A. Otaviano; 6 males , 17 females ( INPA 2396), Alto Alegre, rio Rainha do Inajá, cachoeira Macabei, tributary of rio Mucajai, [ 3°15ʹ44.803ʺ N , 063°53ʹ51.69ʺ W ], 21-IV-1994 , colls. V . Py-Daniel et al.; 1 male ( MIRR 324), Boa Vista, Cachoeirinha, rio Cauamé, 02°52ʹ N , 060°44ʹ W , 31-I-2011 , colls. P.M. Castro, F.C. Zanetti, A.A. Otaviano and D. Teixeira; 11 males , 30 females , 11 immat. spec. ( INPA 2350), Boa Vista, urban area, praia Caçari, rio Cauamé, 02°52ʹ N , 060°39ʹ W , 31-I-2011 , colls. P.M. Castro et al.; 3 males , 3 females , 1 immat. spec. ( INPA 2349), Cantá, fazenda Rossi, igarapé Azul, tributary of rio Branco, [ 02°47ʹ36.589ʺ N , 060°38ʹ26.59ʺ W ], 05-IV-2008 , coll. F.A.G. Melo; 1 male ( INPA 2401), Alto Alegre, serra dos Surucucus, Yanomami Indigenous Area, rio Mucajaí basin [ 02°47ʹ N , 063°40ʹ W ], date unknown, colls. V . Py-Daniel et al.; 4 males , 6 females , 2 immat. spec. ( INPA 2404), Boa Vista, farm 29 km from Boa Vista, unnamed igarapé, tributary of rio Branco, [ 02°46ʹ08.53ʺ N , 060°39ʹ22.63ʺ W ], 29- III-1992 , colls. J.A.A. Gomes, J. Zuanon, J. Sulivane and J. Santos; 1 male ( INPA 2395), Cantá, igarapé Azul, tributary of rio Branco, BR 401 road, [ 02°36ʹ34.93ʺ N , 060°36ʹ12.09ʺ W ], 29-X-1987 , colls. V . Py-Daniel et al.; 5 males ( INPA 2399), Alto Alegre, Xitei/Xidea (Yanomami indigenous village), Watatas, rio Parima, 02°36ʹ24ʺ N , 063°52ʹ17ʺ W , 11-IV-2002 , colls. V . Py-Daniel et al.; 6 spec. ( INPA 2400), Alto Alegre, Homoxi (Yanomami indigenous village), upper rio Mucajaí (Uxua-ú), tributary of rio Mucajaí, 02°29ʹ N , 063°43ʹ W , IV-2002 , coll. W. Milliken; 6 males , 1 female , 1 immat. spec. ( MIRR 211), Mucajai, Apiaú region, igarapé Perdido, tributary of rio Mucajai, [ 02°26ʹ27.502ʺ N , 060°56ʹ17.059ʺ W ], 29-IX- 2009 , colls. D. A. Lima , C. R . Araújo, E. A. Barbosa, F. C. Zanetti and J.S. Tavares; 3 immat. males ( MIRR 224), 2 spec. ( MIRR 225), Mucajaí, Roxinho region, igarapé Mota, tributary of rio Mucajaí, [ 02°26ʹ27.50ʺ N , 060°56ʹ17.059ʺ W ], 25-VIII-2009 , coll. J.C. Tavares; 3 males , 4 females ( MIRR 207), Mucajaí, Apiaú region, igarapé Perdido, tributary of rio Mucajaí, [ 02°26ʹ27.50ʺ N , 060°56ʹ17.059ʺ W ], 19-IX-2009 , coll. J. Santos and M.B. Santos; 6 males , 13 females , 11 immat. spec. ( INPA 2375), São Luiz do Anauá, vicinal 21, igarapé Luizão, tributary of rio Anauá, 01°05ʹ27.7ʺ N , 060°00ʹ46.9ʺ W , 31-I-2015 , colls. Guterres; 5 males , 14 females (2377), São João da Baliza, vicinal 28, igarapé near BR 210 road, tributary of rio Caroebe, 00°55ʹ50.6ʺ N , 059°52ʹ21.5ʺ W , 29-IV- 2015 , colls. M.A.L. Santos, F.C. Zanetti, P.M. Castro, S.C. Emídio and A. R . Lima ; 3 males , 6 females , 4 immat. spec. ( INPA 2361), Caroebe, vicinal 35, igarapé Taboca, tributary of rio Caroebe, 00°55ʹ02.0ʺ N 059°43ʹ41.3ʺ W , 03-II-2015 , colls. F.C. Zanetti, I. R .S. Almeida, M.A.L. Santos and S.C. Emídio; 26 males , 30 females , 52 immat. spec. ( INPA 2378), Caroebe, Entre Rios , igarapé Espanta Moleque, tributary of rio Jatapú, 00°54ʹ02.8ʺ N , 059°25ʹ52.9ʺ W , 02-II-2015 , colls. M.A.L. Santos, F.C. Zanetti, I. R .S. Almeida, S.C. Emídio and B.C.A. Santos; 2 females ( INPA 2357), Caroebe, rio Caroebe, sítio Sumaúma, vicinal 5, 00°50ʹ44.2ʺ N , 059°17ʹ08.2ʺ W , 03-II-2015 , colls. M.A.L. Santos, F.C. Zanetti, I. R .S. Almeida and S.C. Emídio; 2 males ( INPA 2354), Caroebe, Entre Rios , rio Jatapu, 00°45ʹ37.1ʺ N , 059°17ʹ08.2ʺ W , 2-II-2015 , colls. M.A.L. Santos, F.C. Zanetti, I. R .S. Almeida and S.C. Emídio; 1 male , 7 females ( INPA 2364), São Luiz do Anauá, fazenda Água Limpa, rio dos Peixes, tributary of rio Jauaperí, 00°41ʹ11.5ʺ N , 060°11ʹ17.4ʺ W , 5-XII-2015 ; colls. M.A.L. Santos and F.K.A. Santos; 3 males ( INPA 2392), Rorainópolis, vila Colina, igarapé on vicinal 20, tributary of rio Jauaperi, 00°37ʹ16.7ʺ N , 060°29ʹ53.9ʺ W , 21-XII-2014 , colls. M.A.L. Santos, B.C.A. Santos and N.L. Ferreira; 29 males , 14 females ( INPA 2362), Rorainópolis, Vila Colina, BR 174 road, rio Jauaperi, 00°30ʹ51.2ʺ N , 060°27ʹ54.9ʺ W , 29-IV-2015 , colls. M.A.L. Santos, F.C. Zanetti, P.M. Castro, S.C. Emídio and A. R . Lima ; 1 male , 1 female ( INPA 2331), Caracaraí, igarapé Defrento, tributary of rio Anauá, 00°00ʹ02ʺ N , 061°29ʹ19ʺ W , 24-IX-2006 , coll. L. Rapp Py-Daniel; 5 males , 6 females , 9 immat. spec. ( MIRR 322), 5 spec. ( MIRR 275), 14 spec. ( MIRR 251), Caracaraí, Caicubi, igarapé Tubana, tributary of rio Jufari, [ 01°17ʹ09.35ʺ S , 061°55ʹ57.40ʺ W ], 06-IX-2011 , colls. P.M. Castro and A.A. Otaviano.

Distribution. Venezuela , Guyana , Suriname , French Guiana , Brazil (Amazonas, Amapá , Bahia , Maranhão , Mato Grosso , Pará, Paraná , Roraima , São Paulo ), Colombia , Peru , Ecuador (see Pimentel and Magalhães 2014 for references; this study). The distribution in Roraima is depicted in Figure 9 .
Remarks. The morphology of our specimens agrees quite well with the description provided by Holthuis (1952) , García-Dávila and Magalhães (2003) , and Melo (2003) .

Macrobrachium brasiliense
was first recorded in Ror- aima by Castro and Silva (2013) from the municipality of Mucajaí, and some of their specimens were misidentified as
M. inpa
. The records presented here show that the species is widely distributed in the state of Roraima ( Fig. 9 ).
